categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Gerata was a male Human Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. During the Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, he resided on the Vaiken Spacedock.
Master Gerata was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic with the Knights of the Eternal Throne expansion as Republic-side vendor for Galactic Command system.
